switch.description: To configure the command account swith.

authentication-template.description: To configure the global authentication template number.

authortication-template.description: To configure the global authorization template number.

global-enable-type.description: To configure global enable authentication type.

enable-level-secret.description: To configure enable password and privilege level.

enable-secret.description: To configure enable password and privilege level.

password.description: Set the password for enable authentication. The length of cleartext is 3~128 characters, the length of ciphertext is 24 or 63 characters.

bind-authentication-template.description: To configure default user authentication template number.

bind-authortication-template.description: To configure default user authortication template number.

enable-type.description: To configure default enable authentication type.

authen-type.description: To configure default enable authentication type.

authentication-template.description: To Configure default user authentication template.

user-group.description: Configure user group information for PPP authentication.

username.description: Configure the user name in the group.

encrypted-password.description: Configure the encrypted password of a user in a group.

unencrypted-password.description: Configure the unencrypted password of a user in a group.

root-user.description: Configuring the Password of the root User, The root password cannot be deleted.

password.description: To configure root user password. The length of cleartext is 6~128 characters.

length.description: set the minimum length of strong password

character-strategy.description: Set the character strategy of strong password.

character-type.description: Set the character combination of strong password.
Set the character combination of strong password.

character-set-num.description: Set the number of character sets that must be included in the password.
Set the number of character types that must be included in the password.

min-num.description: The minimum number of character sets

character.description: set the character combination of strong password

substring.description: Check the substring associated with username(case insensitive)

inverse.description: Check the inverse substring associated with username

date-check.description: Set password date-related check. Any date ranging from 1 January 1970 to 31 December 2037 is not allowed. The date formats include: YYYYMMDD, MMDDYYYY, DDMMYYYY, YYYY-MM-DD, MM-DD-YYYY, DD-MM-YYYY

max-length.description: Set the maximum length of the password

strong-password-check.description: The status of strong password check

status.description: The status of strong password check

duplicated-password.description: To configure the interval times of last same passwords.

password-duration.description: The configuration of password duration related.
Set the number of days the password is valid.

remind-before-expire.description: Set the number of days to remind before the password expires. The default is 3 days. Allows you to set the reminder days to be greater than the number of days the password is valid.

login-block.description: This command configures and activates the anti-attack monitoring function for remote login.

attemp-times.description: The max try times of login failure.

login-failure-alarm.description: This command configure the system to create the log information or TRAP information when a login attempt failed.

every-times.description: Set failure try times when alarm

login-quiet-mode-acl.description: To configure login quiet mode acl.

user-authen-restriction.description: Set the maximum number of consecutive authentication failures and locking times for users.

fail-times.description: Set the consecutive failure times (0: means no limit).

period.description: Set the time length of continuous authentication failures. The user will be locked automatically after the specified number of times of continuous authentication failures within period.

min-length.description: Set the minimum length of the username

day.description: Set the local user aging period. If the local user is not used continuously for a period of time that reaches the aging period,the user is disabled.

local-user-change-password.description: A user that has passed local authentication modifies its password.

local-user-offline.description: Local user configuration changes kick users offline.

password-changed.description: Set change the local user password and kick the user offline.

locked.description: Set lock the local user and kick the user offline.

change-password.description: The restriction policy of changing password.

max-times-per-day.description: Maximum number of changing password within a day.

password-duration.description: Set the number of days the password is valid. If set to 0, the password never expires.

remind-before-expire.description: Set the number of days to remind before the password expires. The default is 3 days. Allows you to set the reminder days to be greater than the number of days the password is valid. When the password never expires, the reminder days is invalid.

once-password.description: Must modify password when first login.

lock.description: Lock or unlock a local user. Locked user is not allowed to login device.

change-password-expired.description: Change password after the password expired.

enable-type.description: To configure user enable authentication type.

password-recover-remind.description: Set the question and answer of user password recover.

question.description: Set the question of user password reset.

answer.description: Set the answer of user password reset.

day.description: Set the specified local user aging period. If the user is not used continuously for a period of time that reaches the aging period, the user is disabled. The number of day is 0, indicating that the user is not aging.

user-authen-restriction.description: Set the maximum number of consecutive authentication failures and locking times for local users.

period.description: Set the time length of continuous authentication failures. The user will be locked automatically after the specified number of times of continuous authentication failures within period.

change-password.description: The restriction policy of changing password.

authen-template.description: The authentication template configuration of ADM_MGR.

bind-aaa-authen-template.description: Configure template number of AAA which is binded by the authentication template.

ipv4-acl.description: Configure IPv4 ACL name binded by the authentication template.

ipv6-acl.description: Configure IPv6 ACL name binded by the authentication template.

method.description: Configure authentication method of the authentication template.

ascii.description: Configure the TACACS+ authentication method as ASCII. The RADIUS protocol does not support ASCII authentication. If only the ASCII authentication mode is specified, but the RADIUS authentication mode is not specified, the default authentication mode is CHAP.

pap-authentication.description: Configure RADIUS authentication method is PAP.

pap.description: Configure RADIUS authentication method is PAP.

chap.description: Configure RADIUS authentication method is CHAP.

description.description: Configure description of the authentication template.

login-sametime-max.description: Set the max times of user login in the same time

ftp-top-directory.description: Set the top directory and access authority of FTP

sftp-top-directory.description: Set the top directory and access authority of SFTP

console.description: Allow users to login via console.

only-telnet.description: Allow users to login via Telnet.

telnet.description: Allow users to login via Telnet and console.

ssh.description: Allow users to login via SSH.

ftp.description: Allow users to login via FTP.

web.description: Allow users to login via WEB.

logfile-access.description: Set the access permission of logfile.

logfile-allowed.description: Set the access permission of log file.

log-suffix.description: Set the access permission of log with suffix.

read-write-copy.description: The read-write and copy access authority

chmode-access.description: Set the access permission of file or directory.

chmode.description: Set the access permission of file or directory.

absolute-path.description: Set the absolute path of a file or directory

username.description: If the local user is aged, it will be activated. If the lcal user is not aged, the aging time is update and the calculation is restarted.
